column4: hi all i need help im trying to install ubuntu on my  pc ( masus m2n-mx se , 1 gig ram,) but when i start the cd its loaded then  i get a  x window error,  the ubuntu is the   one that is avalaible to download (i downloaeded it 2 days ago)
